toolset_description:
Xenoblade Toolset is a collection of conversion tools under XenoLib.
This toolset runs on Spike foundation.
Head to this **[Wiki](https://github.com/PredatorCZ/Spike/wiki/Spike)** for more information on how to effectively use it.
## Release authenticity
Every release asset will contain corresponding `.sig` file, together with [Sign Key](sign_key.asc) can be used to verify asset via gpg.
Simple usage:
```bash gpg --import sign_key.asc # Required only once gpg --verify <asset_name>.sig ```
smt_extract: Extract and convert textures from stream files into DDS.
tex_to_dds: Convert textures or streamed textures into DDS format.
extract_shaders: Extract shaders from models, shader bundles or shaders. Converts them into GLSL code and/or shader assembly.
bdat_to_json: Converts BDAT data file or BDAT collection to JSON.
asm_to_json: Converts Animation State Machine graph to JSON.
extract_arh: Extract files from ARH/ARD archive pair.
im_to_gltf: Convert streamed map instanced meshes to GLTF.
tm_to_gltf: Convert streamed map terrain model to GLTF.
